title: Remco Evenepoel commits to Quick-Step, Tadej Pogačar braces for ‘even more interesting’ Tour de France in post-merger shakeout
content:
Evenepoel quells transfer rumors, leaves potential for box-office showdown with Roglič, Vingegaard, Pogačar at 2024 Tour de France.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel commits to Quick-Step, Tadej Pogačar braces for ‘even more interesting’ Tour de France in post-merger shakeout on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
